column4: 'ensure cloud trail logfile validation is enabled'
'ensure s3 bucket cloudtrail logs is not publicaly accesible'
'Ensure CloudTrail logs are integrated with cloud watch logs'
'Ensure AWS Config is enabled in all regions'
